revised_title: Dental Enamel Formation and Structure: A Study on Enamel Development in Various Animals
tldr: This paper investigates the formation and structure of dental enamel in various animals, including the existence of a membrane between enamel-forming cells, the process of enamel formation through deposit, and the role of cells in enamel development. The study also examines the varicosities of enamel rods and the Retzius bands in forming teeth.
